channel.title: Qqq on Archive 03
channel.description: Recent content in Qqq on Archive 03

item.title: Hot AI Investments: Top 3 AI ETFs Accessible Even to Beginners
item.description: In 2025, the AI craze is heating up the stock market. However, selecting individual stocks can be daunting for beginners. Mew, Kurumi, and Mikael intensely debate and analyze the top 3 ETFs that allow for low-cost, diversified investment to participate in AI growth. From semiconductors to Nasdaq, find the AI ETF that matches your investment style.

item.title: The SCHD and QQQ Combo: Is It Really That Powerful? (A Deep Dive into the Pros and Cons)
item.description: QQQ, the standard-bearer for growth stocks, and SCHD, the symbol of value. Is this the perfect combination? From the synergy of explosive growth and stable cash flow to the risks of US-only exposure and value traps, three unique characters break it all down.
